templateOptions.label: Base URI
templateOptions.description: The BaseURI of the API endpoint(s). Can be found at SDB API Swagger docs: https://api.sdbstart.nl/swagger/ui/index

templateOptions.label: API User
templateOptions.description: The user used to call the WebAPI, this is used as identifier

templateOptions.label: API Key
templateOptions.description: The key used in the authentication mechanism

templateOptions.label: Customer Number
templateOptions.description: The customer number for which the request is executed, you may be authorized for multiple clients within the WebAPI therefore we always want to know which client number the requests are intended for. In many cases the customer number is equal to the user

templateOptions.label: Update account when correlating and mapped data differs
templateOptions.description: When toggled, the acount will be updated when the mapped HelloID data differs from the data in the target system in the create action (not just correlate).

templateOptions.label: Toggle debug logging
templateOptions.description: When toggled, debug logging will be displayed
